name: Post-button
tagline: The Post button lets people post songs to their stream while adding a message
body:
### Undrtone Post Button Examples Button with default size to post the song Dogs by Pink Floyd. ```
Pigs - Pink Floyd
``` Button at 50px to post the song Ancient Light by Allman Brown. ```
Ancient Light - Allman Brown
``` ###Need Help? Check the [documentation](https://github.com/undrtone/Post-Button) or contact us at support@undrtone.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
